statements: UPDATE RecipeModifications SET modification_description = 'Added Salt' WHERE recipe_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'

UPDATE recipe_versions SET modified_by = 'Alice', modification_timestamp = current_timestamp WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE recipe_ingredients SET unit = 'oz', quantity = 10.5, created_timestamp = '2023-10-25 08:30:00' WHERE id = 2;

UPDATE recipe_ingredients SET quantity = 3.50, unit = 'tbsp' WHERE ingredient_id = 201 AND recipe_id = 101;
